system.description:
Your reliance on good fortune opens you up to new encounters and the benefits thereof.

Whether you had enemies in town before you arrived or not, there are those who find you offensive. Fortunately, they have enemies of their own who delight in tweaking the nose of those they disdain.

You and a number of companions equal to your Charisma modifier enjoy a moderate lifestyle while in settlements of 50 or more individuals at no cost.
